name: Elven Accuracy, Mythic

sections.body: When you make an attack with a longbow or short bow (including composite bows), you can ignore concealment, but not total concealment. You still suffer a miss chance for total concealment, but if you miss due to total concealment, you may reroll your miss chance as per Elven Accuracy.
sections.name: Benefits

description: Your elven eyesight cuts though concealment.
